body: Solomon says that Nigerians have managed to find humor in something as troubling as kidnapping: "Laughter is simply a way of dealing with this most serious issue in Nigerian society. But, this video makes me think of something help."

title: Nigeria: A humorous take on kidnapping

But, this video makes me think of something help."
